name: YGen Development
description:
YGen Development is a software development company from Calgary, Alberta. We formed in 2012 but have been working together for over 8 years. We specialize in website, mobile app and desktop development. We have a passion for software and technology in general, and we all love a good challenge. Whether your project is big or small, simple or complex, we are confident we can meet all your expections and more.
We pride ourselves in our preparation, details and commitment to building the best products for our customers.
